alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 1:57PM EDT until July 03 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... East central Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 156 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rush, or 10 miles northeast of Wyalusing, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rush, Springville, Montrose, Dimock, Harford, New Milford, Hop Bottom, Gibson, Lenoxville and Royal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
